item.title: 王毅：中欧应共同努力加强稳定的贸易关系
item.description:
Europe should not be afraid of working with China because of competition, and the two sides should work together to enhance the reliability and stability of economic and trade relations, foreign minister Wang Yi said on Friday.翻译:外交部长王毅周五表示，欧洲不应因为竞争而害怕与中国合作，双方应共同努力增强经贸关系的可靠性和稳定性。

European officials have repeatedly vowed to reduce economic dependencies on China in critical sectors - otherwise known as "de-risking" - in the face of what the G7 calls China's "economic coercion".翻译:面对七国集团所谓的中国“经济胁迫”，欧洲官员一再发誓要减少关键领域对中国的经济依赖，也称为“去风险”。

"China's position is clear. We will adhere to our support of Europe's strategic autonomy," Wang said when asked about China's view of its relationship with Europe at a press briefing with his French counterpart in Beijing.翻译:“中方的立场是明确的。我们将坚持支持欧洲的战略自主权，”王毅在北京与法国外长举行的新闻发布会上被问及中方对中欧关系的看法时表示。

French Foreign Minister Catherine Colonna was visiting the Chinese capital, and earlier met Premier Li Qiang with whom she discussed a broad range of topics including rebalancing France's economic relationship with the world's second-largest economy.翻译:法国外交部长凯瑟琳·科隆纳正在访问中国首都，并于早些时候会见了李强总理，双方讨论了广泛的话题，包括重新平衡法国与世界第二大经济体的经济关系。

Colonna said France was committed to dialogue with China, affirming ties after a European Union anti-subsidy probe backed by Paris into Chinese-made electric vehicles was blasted as "protectionist" by Beijing.翻译:科隆纳表示，法国致力于与中国对话，在巴黎支持的欧盟对中国制造的电动汽车进行反补贴调查被北京方面斥为“保护主义”后，法国坚定了与中国的关系。

Her trip is centred on encouraging exchanges between citizens of both countries such as students and tourists, threatened to be overshadowed by the trade issues.翻译:她此行的重点是鼓励学生和游客等两国公民之间的交流，这些交流可能被贸易问题所掩盖。

"We are really committed to dialogue with China," Colonna told Li, adding that she was "honoured" and happy to see him after their Paris meeting in June.翻译:“我们真的致力于与中国对话，”科隆纳告诉李克强，并补充说她很“荣幸”并很高兴在六月巴黎会议后见到他。

Wang said the differing demands of competition and cooperation need not clash.翻译:王说，竞争与合作的不同诉求并不冲突。

"Of course there will be competition in cooperation, but we should not be afraid of cooperation because of competition. The biggest risk we need to get rid of is the uncertainty brought by broad politicisation," Wang said, adding that the dependency most in need of reduction is protectionism.翻译:“合作中当然会有竞争，但我们不应该因为竞争而害怕合作。我们需要摆脱的最大风险是广泛政治化带来的不确定性。”王说，并补充说，最需要的是依赖减少就是保护主义。

"At present, exchanges between China's business circles are resuming in an all-round way and heating up rapidly. We will listen to the voices of the European business community, earnestly solve the problems of investors in China," Wang said in the press briefing with his counterpart.翻译:“当前，中国工商界交流正在全面恢复并迅速升温。我们将倾听欧洲工商界的声音，切实解决在华投资者的问题。”王毅在新闻发布会上表示。与他的对手。

Both foreign ministers agreed to cooperate on a number of fronts.翻译:两国外长同意在多个领域进行合作。

"With China, we are working to find answers to global climate, biodiversity and debt challenges," Colonna wrote in a post on social media platform X.翻译:科隆纳在社交媒体平台 X 上发帖称：“我们正在与中国一起努力寻找全球气候、生物多样性和债务挑战的答案。”

Wang said he hopes to deepen exchanges with France in civil nuclear and aerospace, and explore emerging areas such as education and scientific research.翻译:王毅表示，希望深化与法国在民用核能、航天等领域的交流，探索教育、科研等新兴领域。

The Chinese premier, in his meeting with Colonna earlier, also took an upbeat stance on broader bilateral ties.翻译:中国总理早些时候在会见科隆纳时也对更广泛的双边关系采取了乐观立场。

"Under the strategic leadership of President Xi Jinping and (French) President (Emmanuel) Macron, the relationship between China and France has been developing better and better in all aspects since this year," Li said.翻译:李克强表示，今年以来，在习近平主席和马克龙总统的战略引领下，中法关系各方面发展越来越好。

"Next year will be the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and France, and both of us are sustaining our efforts in the hope that the 60th year would see a big development and a big breakthrough."

CHINA-EU SUMMIT LOOMS

Colonna's trip precedes a visit by the European Commission and Council presidents, Ursula von der Leyen and Charles Michel, to Beijing in early December for the first in-person summit with President Xi Jinping in four years, after China-EU relations nosedived during the pandemic.翻译:科隆纳此行之前，欧盟委员会和理事会主席乌尔苏拉·冯德莱恩和查尔斯·米歇尔将于 12 月初访问北京，与习近平主席进行四年来的首次面对面峰会，此前中欧关系在疫情期间急转直下。

Macron, who met with Xi in China earlier this year, has argued the EU should stop being naive and demand a level playing field with countries like China, and had been pushing the European Commission behind the scenes to launch the probe.翻译:马克龙今年早些时候在中国会见了习近平，他认为欧盟应该停止天真，要求与中国等国家建立公平的竞争环境，并一直在幕后推动欧盟委员会启动调查。

China is France's third-largest trade partner, but French and other European firms are concerned about China's vast trade imbalance with the EU, its opaque legislation on cross-border data transfers and cheap Chinese EVs flooding the European market, threatening domestic carmakers.翻译:中国是法国第三大贸易伙伴，但法国和其他欧洲公司对中国与欧盟巨大的贸易不平衡、跨境数据传输立法不透明以及廉价的中国电动汽车充斥欧洲市场，威胁国内汽车制造商感到担忧。

France is also concerned about Chinese attempts to force French cosmetics companies to share manufacturing secrets with Chinese parties.翻译:法国还对中国试图迫使法国化妆品公司与中方分享制造秘密感到担忧。

France is China's top source of cosmetics and wine imports, according to China's customs agency, with French luxury titans such as LMVH (LVMH.PA) particularly dependent on Chinese consumers. The lack of a strong rebound in luxury demand following China's post-pandemic re-opening has spooked investors.翻译:据中国海关称，法国是中国最大的化妆品和葡萄酒进口来源地，LMVH (LVMH.PA)等法国奢侈品巨头尤其依赖中国消费者。中国疫情后重新开放后奢侈品需求缺乏强劲反弹令投资者感到恐慌。

Xi insisted China welcomes investment from French firms in a telephone call on Monday with Macron, who urged fair treatment for foreign companies in China.翻译:习近平周一在与马克龙的电话中坚称中国欢迎法国公司的投资，马克龙敦促公平对待在华外国公司。

Reporting by Laurie Chen and John Irish; Additional reporting by Dominique Patton, Judy Hua and Ryan Woo; Writing by Bernard Orr; Editing by Raju Gopalakrishnan, Miral Fahmy and Hugh Lawson翻译:Laurie Chen 和 John Irish 的报道；多米尼克·巴顿 (Dominique Patton)、朱迪·华 (Judy Hua) 和瑞安·吴 (Ryan Woo) 的补充报道；伯纳德·奥尔撰写；编辑：Raju Gopalakrishnan、Miral Fahmy 和 Hugh Lawson

item.title: 缅甸特使会谈时，车队在中国边境被烧毁
item.description:
A convoy of trucks bringing goods into Myanmar from China has gone up in flames in what state media reported on Friday was an insurgent attack, compounding surging insecurity that has raised concern in neighbouring China.翻译:官方媒体周五报道称，一支从中国运往缅甸的卡车车队起火，这是一起叛乱分子袭击事件，加剧了日益加剧的不安全局势，引发了邻国中国的担忧。

The fire in the town of Muse came as China's ambassador to Myanmar met top officials in the Myanmar capital for talks on stability on the border after recent signs that their relationship has been coming under rare strain.翻译:木姐镇火灾发生之际，中国驻缅甸大使在缅甸首都会见高级官员，就边境稳定问题进行会谈。最近有迹象表明，中缅关系正面临罕见的紧张。

"Due to this terrorist act ... about 120 out of 258 vehicles carrying household goods, consumer goods, clothes and building materials were destroyed by fire," the state-run Global New Light of Myanmar newspaper reported, referring to an opposition alliance that launched an offensive against the junta a month ago.翻译:缅甸国营《全球新光报》报道称，“由于这一恐怖行为……258 辆运载家庭用品、消费品、衣服和建筑材料的车辆中约有 120 辆被大火烧毁”，该报指的是一个反对派联盟，该联盟一个月前对军政府发起进攻。

Li Kyar Win, a spokesman for one of the insurgent forces, denied torching the convoy saying it did not conduct attacks that would "destroy the people's interests".翻译:其中一支叛乱部队发言人李凯温(Li Kyar Win)否认纵火焚烧车队，称其没有进行“破坏人民利益”的袭击。

Myanmar's military has lost control of several towns and military outposts in the northeast and elsewhere around the country as it grapples with the biggest coordinated offensive it has faced since it seized power in a 2021 coup.翻译:缅甸军方正在努力应对自 2021 年政变中夺取政权以来所面临的最大规模的协同攻势，该国军方已失去对东北部和全国其他地区的几个城镇和军事哨所的控制。

More than 2 million people have been displaced in different parts of the country due to the surge of fighting, the United Nations says.翻译:联合国表示，由于战斗激增，该国各地已有超过 200 万人流离失所。

Earlier in the week, at least 10 people were killed in Laukkai town, which like Muse is also in Shan State on the border with China, media reported, when a rocket hit a vehicle of people trying to flee the fighting.翻译:据媒体报道，本周早些时候，一枚火箭弹击中了一辆试图逃离战斗的人的车辆，造成至少 10 人死亡。

Spokespeople for the junta and a rebel group operating in the area both condemned the incident and denied responsibility.翻译:军政府和在该地区活动的叛乱组织发言人均谴责了这一事件，并否认对此负责。

Reuters could not independently verify the death toll in the attack.翻译:路透社无法独立核实袭击中的死亡人数。

China has called for peace and stability in Myanmar and the latest unrest came as its ambassador, Chen Hai, was meeting Myanmar's military-appointed foreign minister, Than Swe, and military officials in the capital, Naypyitaw.翻译:中国呼吁缅甸实现和平与稳定，最新的骚乱发生之际，中国大使陈海正在首都内比都会见缅甸军方任命的外交部长丹瑞和军方官员。

They discussed "bilateral relations, continued implementation of mutually beneficial bilateral projects" and "cooperation in peace and stability and rule of law along the borde", Myanmar state media reported.翻译:据缅甸官方媒体报道，他们讨论了“双边关系、继续实施互利的双边项目”以及“边境地区和平稳定与法治合作”。

China's embassy in Myanmar issued a notice late on Friday asking Chinese nationals stranded in Laukkai to evacuate as soon as possible, citing "high" safety risks.

CRACKDOWN ON CRIME

Before the latest insurgent offensive, Chinese and Myanmar junta officials had launched a crackdown in the region on gangs operating internet fraud centres that China blames for cheating many of its people.翻译:在最近的叛乱攻势之前，中国和缅甸军政府官员已在该地区对经营互联网诈骗中心的团伙发起打击，中国指责这些团伙欺骗了许多人民。

As part of that drive, Myanmar handed over tens of thousands Chinese telecom fraud suspects this month.翻译:作为这一行动的一部分，缅甸本月移交了数万名中国电信诈骗嫌疑人。

The fighting close to the border and the drive against the online fraud gangs, many organised by Chinese criminals, has shone a spotlight on the neighbours' relations.翻译:边境附近的战斗以及对网络诈骗团伙（其中许多是由中国犯罪分子组织）的打击，使邻国关系成为人们关注的焦点。

China has been supportive of the Myanmar military since it seized power in 2021 but Chinese authorities have for years had complex cross-border relations with factions in northeast Myanmar often outside the control of the central government.翻译:自缅甸2021年夺权以来，中国一直支持缅甸军方，但多年来中国当局与缅甸东北部各派之间的跨境关系复杂，往往不受中央政府的控制。

Myanmar authorities have long suspected China of meddling in support of some militia factions.翻译:缅甸当局长期以来一直怀疑中国干预支持一些民兵派别。

On the weekend, in a rare rally in Myanmar since a sweeping crackdown on dissent, dozens of nationalist protesters gathered outside the Chinese embassy in the main city of Yangon with banners and posters critical of Beijing.翻译:周末，数十名民族主义抗议者聚集在主要城市仰光的中国大使馆外，举着批评北京的横幅和海报，这是缅甸自全面镇压异见以来罕见的集会。

"We request China government don't support northern terrorist groups," read one of their posters, in English.翻译:他们的一张英文海报上写道：“我们要求中国政府不要支持北方恐怖组织。”

Junta spokesman Zaw Min Tun later said the protesters were opposed to the insurgents. He did not refer to their call for China not to support the rebels but accused the Western media of trying to destroy Myanmar's relations with China.翻译:军政府发言人佐敏吞后来表示，抗议者反对叛乱分子。他没有提及他们呼吁中国不要支持叛乱分子，而是指责西方媒体试图破坏缅甸与中国的关系。

Reporting by Albee Zhang, Ryan Woo in Beijing, and Reuters staff; Editing by Edmund Klamann, Robert Birsel翻译:Albee 张、Ryan Woo 北京以及路透社工作人员的报道；编辑：埃德蒙·克拉曼、罗伯特·伯塞尔

item.title: 独家：中国汽车在俄罗斯的销售热潮在当地复苏不稳定的情况下趋于平稳
item.description:
Chinese car sales in Russia appear to have peaked as domestic production recovers after the exodus of Western automakers, data shared with Reuters showed, but recent growth in the market may stall as high import costs and interest rates begin to bite.翻译:路透社分享的数据显示，随着西方汽车制造商撤离后国内生产恢复，中国汽车在俄罗斯的销量似乎已达到顶峰，但由于高进口成本和利率开始受到影响，近期市场增长可能会停滞。

The figures are early indicators that Russia's car market, and China's role in it, have stabilised after nearly two years of upheaval caused by sanctions placed on Moscow and Western companies' sudden exit in the wake of the invasion of Ukraine.翻译:这些数据是初步迹象，表明俄罗斯汽车市场以及中国在其中的角色在经历了近两年因莫斯科制裁和入侵乌克兰后西方公司突然退出而引发的动荡之后已经趋于稳定。

But the sector, which saw an almost 60% slump in sales in 2022 and production sink to a post-Soviet low, is still a long way from its pre-invasion levels. Sales and output in 2023 are set to be among the lowest in the last 10 years.翻译:但该行业 2022 年销售额下降了近 60%，产量也降至后苏联时期的低点，与入侵前的水平相比仍有很大差距。 2023 年的销售额和产量预计将处于过去 10 年来的最低水平。

Prior to the February 2022 invasion, Chinese cars accounted for less than 10% of the Russian market. In August this year, Chinese brands' share of sales peaked at almost 56%, data from analytical agency Autostat and its partner consulting company PPK showed.翻译:在2022年2月入侵之前，中国汽车在俄罗斯市场的份额不到10%。分析机构Autostat及其合作伙伴咨询公司PPK的数据显示，今年8月，中国品牌的销售份额达到了近56%的峰值。

That percentage has now levelled off, with Chinese brands selling around 60,000 units each month since August, corresponding to a 53% share in September. Sales include imported vehicles and those made inside Russia.翻译:这一比例现已趋于平稳，自 8 月以来，中国品牌每月销量约为 60,000 辆，相当于 9 月的 53% 份额。销售包括进口车辆和俄罗斯境内制造的车辆。

Chinese carmakers such as Haval (601633.SS), Chery and Geely (0175.HK) are capitalising on the departure of Western players that used to dominate the market before the invasion of Ukraine, showing Moscow's increasing dependence on Beijing and growing economic ties with China as the West shuns Russia over the war.翻译:哈弗（601633.SS） 、奇瑞和吉利（0175.HK）等中国汽车制造商正在利用在入侵乌克兰之前曾主导市场的西方企业的退出，这表明莫斯科对北京的依赖日益增加，以及与中国的经济联系日益紧密。西方在战争中回避俄罗斯，而中国则在其中。

Russia has jumped from 11th place to become China's largest export market for cars, reaching a value of $9.4 billion in January-October, Chinese customs data showed. In the same period of last year, car exports to Russia amounted to $1.1 billion.翻译:中国海关数据显示，俄罗斯从第11位一跃成为中国最大的汽车出口市场，1-10月出口额达到94亿美元。去年同期，对俄罗斯的汽车出口额达11亿美元。

Overall, monthly car sales in Russia are now more than double what they were a year ago, Autostat data showed, while separate data from federal statistics service Rosstat showed car production was nearly three times higher in September year-on-year, underlining the sector's partial recovery.翻译:Autostat 数据显示，总体而言，俄罗斯每月汽车销量是一年前的两倍多，而联邦统计服务 Rosstat 的单独数据显示 9 月份汽车产量同比增长近三倍，突显了该行业的部分恢复。

Chinese carmakers were crucial in that process, but with demand now largely satisfied there is a ceiling for their further expansion in the sector, Autostat Executive Director Sergei Udalov told Reuters.翻译:Autostat执行董事谢尔盖·乌达洛夫(Sergei Udalov)告诉路透社，中国汽车制造商在这一过程中发挥了至关重要的作用，但由于目前需求已基本得到满足，因此他们在该行业的进一步扩张存在上限。

"The market has reached a state of equilibrium - the main Chinese brands have come to Russia and (pent-up) demand is satisfied," Udalov said.翻译:“市场已经达到平衡状态——主要的中国品牌已经来到俄罗斯，（被压抑的）需求得到了满足，”乌达洛夫说。

Russia's leading carmaker Avtovaz, which produces the most popular Lada cars, is catering to demand for cheap cars, while Chinese brands are filling the gap left by Western producers for more expensive vehicles, Udalov added.翻译:乌达洛夫补充说，俄罗斯领先的汽车制造商Avtovaz生产最受欢迎的拉达汽车，正在迎合人们对廉价汽车的需求，而中国品牌则正在填补西方生产商生产更昂贵汽车的空白。

That trend could change should either Avtovaz or Chinese carmakers seek to dip their toes into different pricing categories, Udalov said, but for now, despite depressed sales and production, the market's prospects for growth are slim.

'UNSTABLE, SHAKY' MARKET

Sanctions against Russia contributed to lower car production and sales most notably in 2022, but also after Moscow annexed the Crimean peninsula from Ukraine in 2014.翻译:对俄罗斯的制裁导致汽车产量和销量下降，尤其是在 2022 年，以及莫斯科 2014 年从乌克兰吞并克里米亚半岛之后。

Sales have not topped 2 million vehicles since 2014 and production has been lower, too. Just over 626,000 new cars were sold in Russia in 2022 and almost 830,000 were sold in January-October this year.翻译:自 2014 年以来，销量从未超过 200 万辆，产量也有所下降。 2022 年，俄罗斯售出超过 626,000 辆新车，今年 1 月至 10 月售出近 830,000 辆。

A modest recovery is underway from 2022's lows, but the loss of Western technology and expertise is hurting the sector, analysts say, even as Chinese carmakers bed in at some of the factories vacated by their Western counterparts.翻译:分析人士表示，中国汽车制造商正在从 2022 年的低点中小幅复苏，但西方技术和专业知识的流失正在损害该行业，尽管中国汽车制造商正在恢复西方同行腾出的一些工厂。

In the first three quarters of 2023, Russia produced only a few thousands more cars than in the same period of last year, Rosstat's data showed, but the figures are now trending upwards.翻译:俄罗斯统计局的数据显示，2023年前三个季度，俄罗斯的汽车产量仅比去年同期增加了数千辆，但目前这一数字呈上升趋势。

"The growth of pent-up demand that started in late spring and lasted through August started to run out of steam in September," said economist Natalia Zubarevich, a professor at Moscow State University.翻译:莫斯科国立大学教授、经济学家纳塔利娅·祖巴列维奇表示：“从春末开始，一直持续到八月份的被压抑的需求增长在九月份开始失去动力。”

Wages have been rising, partly due to above-target inflation, but four interest rate hikes since July to 15% mean that although people have more money, credit is far more expensive.翻译:工资一直在上涨，部分原因是通胀高于目标，但自 7 月以来已四次加息至 15%，这意味着尽管人们有更多的钱，但信贷的成本却要高得多。

"The (key) rate should have a depressing effect (on car loans), and this should reveal itself in October and November," Zubarevich said.翻译:祖巴列维奇说：“（关键）利率应该会对（汽车贷款）产生抑制作用，这应该会在 10 月和 11 月显现出来。”

Meanwhile, the rouble's slide to 100 against the dollar this year has made imports more expensive, depressing purchases of Chinese cars. It has since recovered to around 90.翻译:与此同时，卢布兑美元汇率今年跌至100，导致进口产品价格上涨，抑制了中国汽车的购买量。此后已恢复至90左右。

The central bank this month said a ban on imports of some Japanese cars, combined with rouble weakening, was pushing up prices of foreign cars.翻译:央行本月表示，禁止进口部分日本汽车，加上卢布贬值，正在推高外国汽车的价格。

Avtovaz last week lowered its 2023 production forecast of 400,000 Lada cars by up to 10% in response to U.S. sanctions on Russian industry in September, which specifically targeted Avtovaz.翻译:Avtovaz 上周将 2023 年 40 万辆拉达汽车的产量预期下调了 10%，以回应美国 9 月份对俄罗斯工业的制裁，该制裁专门针对 Avtovaz。

"The market is in a highly unstable, shaky state," said Zubarevich.翻译:“市场处于高度不稳定、不稳定的状态，”祖巴列维奇说。

item.title: 王说欧洲不应回避与中国合作
item.description:
Europe should not be afraid of working with China because of competition, foreign minister Wang Yi said at a press briefing on Friday with his French counterpart in Beijing.翻译:外交部长王毅周五在北京与法国外长举行的新闻发布会上表示，欧洲不应因为竞争而害怕与中国合作。

"China's position is clear, we will adhere to our support of Europe's strategic autonomy," Wang said when asked about China's view of its relationship with Europe.翻译:当被问及中方对中欧关系的看法时，王毅表示，中方的立场是明确的，我们将坚持支持欧洲的战略自主。

French Foreign Minister Catherine Colonna was visiting the Chinese capital, and earlier met Premier Li Qiang with whom she discussed a broad range of topics including rebalancing France's economic relationship with the world's second largest economy.翻译:法国外交部长凯瑟琳·科隆纳正在访问中国首都，并于早些时候会见了李强总理，双方讨论了广泛的话题，包括重新平衡法国与世界第二大经济体的经济关系。

China, facing trade issues with the European Union, has also been called out for its non-transparent laws on foreign businesses operating in the country.翻译:中国面临着与欧盟的贸易问题，也因其针对在华经营的外国企业的不透明法律而受到批评。

"We will listen to the voices of European businesses, earnestly solve problems of foreign investors in China," Wang said.翻译:“我们将倾听欧洲企业的声音，认真解决外国投资者在华的问题，”王说。

European officials have repeatedly vowed to reduce economic dependence on China in critical sectors.翻译:欧洲官员一再发誓要减少关键领域对中国的经济依赖。

"Of course there will be competition in cooperation, but we should not be afraid of cooperation because of competition. The biggest risk we need to get rid of is the uncertainty brought by broad politicisation," Wang said, adding that the dependency most in need of reduction is protectionism.翻译:“合作中当然会有竞争，但我们不应该因为竞争而害怕合作。我们需要摆脱的最大风险是广泛政治化带来的不确定性。”王说，并补充说，最需要的是依赖减少就是保护主义。

Wang said China maintains normal friendly relations with all countries including Iran and Russia, as well as France.翻译:王毅表示，中国同伊朗、俄罗斯、法国等世界各国都保持着正常友好关系。

“We believe that as long as China and Europe join hands, there will be no camp confrontation, there will be no world divisions and there will be no new Cold War," he said.翻译:“我们相信，只要中欧携起手来，就不会有阵营对抗，就不会有世界分裂，就不会有新的冷战。”

Wang also said he hopes to deepen traditional exchanges with France in civil nuclear and aerospace and explore emerging areas such as education and scientific research.翻译:王还表示，希望深化与法国在民用核能、航天等领域的传统交流，探索教育、科研等新兴领域。

Reporting by Laurie Chen, Ethan Wang and Bernard Orr; editing by Christina Fincher翻译:Laurie Chen、Ethan Wang 和 Bernard Orr 报道；克里斯蒂娜·芬奇编辑

item.title: 感恩节股市平静，但仍有望创三年来最佳月份
item.description:
Global shares drifted on Friday in the absence of guidance from Wall Street, which was closed for the Thanksgiving holiday the previous day, but they were still on course for their best month since November 2020.翻译:由于华尔街前一天因感恩节假期休市，全球股市周五出现波动，但仍有望创下 2020 年 11 月以来最好的一个月表现。

An indecisive Asia session extended to Europe, with the Stoxx 600 share index (.STOXX) trading flat. Both S&P 500 futures and Nasdaq futures were also little changed.翻译:亚洲时段的犹豫不决延伸至欧洲，斯托克 600 股指数(.STOXX)持平。标准普尔 500 指数期货和纳斯达克期货也几乎没有变化。

In geopolitical news, Israel and Hamas started a four-day ceasefire on Friday and the militants were set to release 13 Israeli women and child hostages later in the day, the first sign of detente in the near seven-week-old war.翻译:地缘政治新闻方面， 以色列和哈马斯周五开始为期四天的停火，武装分子计划在当天晚些时候释放 13 名以色列妇女和儿童人质，这是这场近七周战争缓和的第一个迹象。

MSCI's index of global shares (.MIWD00000PUS) was flat, but still headed for a monthly gain of 8.5% after investors grew increasingly confident that U.S. interest rates have peaked, with the market narrative shifting to the timing of cuts. .翻译:MSCI 全球股票指数(.MIWD00000PUS)持平，但在投资者对美国利率已见顶越来越有信心、市场叙事转向降息时机后，月度涨幅仍达 8.5%。 。

The U.S. central bank has raised benchmark borrowing costs by more than five percentage points since March 2022 as part of a global monetary tightening cycle.翻译:作为全球货币紧缩周期的一部分，自 2022 年 3 月以来，美联储已将基准借贷成本提高了五个百分点以上。

"Weaker (economic) data and weaker inflation in the U.S. has given markets hope you are going to start to see rate cuts," said Peter Doherty, investment management director at Arbuthnot Latham in London.翻译:伦敦Arbuthnot Latham投资管理总监Peter Doherty表示，“美国疲软的（经济）数据和疲弱的通胀给市场带来了降息的希望。”

"But the debate is whether we should be taking profits now," he added, given the potential for a "re-acceleration of U.S. growth," after the world's largest economy confounded recession forecasts throughout 2023.翻译:“但争论的是，我们现在是否应该获利了结，”他补充道，因为全球最大经济体 2023 年经济衰退的预测与美国经济增长重新加速的可能性有关。

Despite optimism having surged across global markets this month, there may also be a lull ahead as investors position their portfolios for 2024, some analysts said.翻译:一些分析师表示，尽管本月全球市场乐观情绪高涨，但随着投资者为 2024 年配置投资组合，未来可能会出现平静。

"You get the talk of the so-called Santa rally, but often times Santa rally doesn't really occur in the last two weeks of December," said Shane Oliver, chief economist at AMP.翻译:AMP 首席经济学家肖恩·奥利弗 (Shane Oliver) 表示：“人们常说所谓的圣诞老人集会，但通常情况下，圣诞老人集会并不会真正发生在 12 月的最后两周。”

"So we could have a couple of weeks with the markets sort of just meandering around and lacking direction."翻译:“因此，未来几周市场可能会徘徊且缺乏方向。”

U.S. 10-year Treasury yields , which set the tone for borrowing costs worldwide, were up 3 bps at 4.4704%, still comfortably below the 5% milestone reached last month.翻译:为全球借贷成本定下基调的美国 10 年期国债收益率上涨 3 个基点，至 4.4704%，仍远低于上个月达到的 5% 里程碑。

Minutes from the latest Fed policy meeting signalled there would not be more hikes unless progress against taming inflation faltered.翻译:美联储最新政策会议纪要表明，除非抑制通胀的进展出现动摇，否则不会进一步加息。

Germany's 10-year bund yield rose for a third session, to 2.655%, reflecting pushback from European Central Bank officials against speculation they were ready to start thinking about cutting rates.翻译:德国10年期国债收益率连续第三个交易日上涨，至2.655%，反映出欧洲央行官员对他们准备开始考虑降息的猜测的抵制。

The dollar index < =USD>, which measures the U.S. currency against six peers, was on the back foot on Friday at 103.71, nearing a three-month low as rate cut bets reduced the appeal of holding dollars.翻译:由于降息押注降低了持有美元的吸引力，衡量美元兑六种货币的美元指数周五下跌至 103.71，接近三个月低点。

In Europe, however, markets reflected a growing pessimism about central banks loosening monetary policy.翻译:然而，在欧洲，市场反映出人们对央行放松货币政策的悲观情绪日益浓厚。

Euro zone bond yields were on track to close the week broadly higher after money markets reflected less certainty about an April 2024 rate cut by the ECB than they had a week ago.翻译:由于货币市场反映欧洲央行 2024 年 4 月降息的确定性低于一周前，欧元区债券收益率本周收盘有望普遍走高。

Germany's benchmark 10-year bund yield was little moved on Friday at 2.639% but has risen 5bps in a week.翻译:德国基准 10 年期国债收益率周五几乎没有变动，为 2.639%，但一周内上涨了 5 个基点。

In the UK, where the Bank of England is now viewed as having to keep interest rates at a 15-year high until late next summer, sterling perched near a 2-1/2 month top at $1.256.翻译:在英国，英国央行目前被认为必须将利率维持在 15 年高位直到明年夏末，英镑汇率徘徊在 2-1/2 个月高位附近 1.256 美元。

In Asia, Japan's Nikkei share index (.225) climbed 0.7%, charging back towards a 33-year high hit on Monday.翻译:在亚洲，日本日经指数(0.225)上涨 0.7%，重返周一创下的 33 年来新高。

Data on Friday showed that Japan's core consumer inflation picked up slightly in October, although by less than expected.翻译:周五的数据显示，日本十月份核心消费者通胀小幅回升，但增幅低于预期。

Mainland China's CSI 300 index dropped 0.7% to its lowest close in more than a month, reflecting investor concern about a property slump and sluggish economy.翻译:中国内地沪深300指数下跌0.7%，创一个多月以来最低收盘价，反映出投资者对房地产低迷和经济低迷的担忧。

On Friday, foreign investors sold a net 6.2 billion yuan ($859.79 million) of mainland Chinese shares via the stock connect channel, the biggest daily outflow in more than a month.翻译:周五，外国投资者通过沪港通渠道净售出 62 亿元人民币（合 8.5979 亿美元）的中国大陆股票，这是一个多月以来最大单日流出量。

Oil prices were steady after tumbling more than 1% on concerns over a delayed OPEC+ meeting. Brent crude futures were virtually flat at $81.68 a barrel.翻译:由于对OPEC+ 会议推迟的担忧，油价暴跌超过 1%，但随后保持稳定。布伦特原油期货几乎持平于每桶 81.68 美元。

Gold was stable at $1,992 per ounce.翻译:黄金稳定在每盎司 1,992 美元。

($1 = 7.2111 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2111 人民币）

item.title: 美元在黑色星期五交易清淡，押注利率已见顶
item.description:
The dollar slipped on Friday as investors bet U.S. interest rates have peaked, while the yen edged higher after Japan's core consumer price growth picked up, reinforcing views that the Bank of Japan (BOJ) may soon roll back monetary stimulus.翻译:由于投资者押注美国利率已见顶，美元周五下跌，而日本核心消费者价格增长回升后日元小幅走高，强化了日本央行可能很快取消货币刺激措施的观点。

With U.S. markets closed on Thursday for the Thanksgiving holiday and due for a shorter Black Friday trading session, currencies are trading narrowly as liquidity is expected to remain thin.翻译:由于美国市场周四因感恩节假期休市，且黑色星期五交易时段较短，货币交投窄幅，因为流动性预计仍将维持稀薄。

The dollar index , which measures the U.S. currency with six peers, eased 0.077% to 103.69, staying close to the two-and-a-half month low of 103.17 it touched earlier this week.翻译:衡量美元与六种货币的美元指数下跌0.077%至103.69，接近本周早些时候触及的两个半月低点103.17。

The index is down 2.8% for the month, on course for its weakest monthly performance in a year on growing expectations the Federal Reserve is done raising interest rates and could start cutting them next year.翻译:该指数本月下跌 2.8%，有望创下一年来最弱的月度表现，原因是人们越来越预期美联储将完成加息，并可能在明年开始降息。

Markets have dialled back expectations of Fed rate cuts in 2024, with futures now showing a 25% chance that it will cut its target rate at the March 2024 policy meeting, according to CME Group's FedWatch tool, compared with a 33% chance last week.翻译:市场已经调低了对美联储 2024 年降息的预期，根据芝商所的 FedWatch 工具，期货目前显示美联储在 2024 年 3 月政策会议上下调目标利率的可能性为 25%，而上周的可能性为 33%。

Jefferies strategist Mohit Kumar said the Fed and the European Central Bank (ECB) will likely cut rates around June and September, while the Bank of England could move around May and August, possibly becoming the first central bank to cut rates.翻译:Jefferies策略师Mohit Kumar表示，美联储和欧洲央行(ECB)可能会在6月和9月左右降息，而英国央行可能会在5月和8月左右降息，可能成为第一家降息的央行。

"It would be difficult for the market to price in earlier rate cuts than June. In our view the bid offer for first cuts is June to Q3 next year," he said.翻译:“市场很难消化比六月更早的降息。我们认为首次降息的出价是从六月到明年第三季度，”他表示。

Elsewhere, the Japanese yen flattened at 149.57, after strengthening following data that showed Japan's core consumer price growth picked up slightly in October, having eased the previous month.翻译:其他方面，日元汇率持平于 149.57，此前数据显示日本核心消费者价格增速较上月放缓，10 月份略有回升，随后日元走强。

That reinforced investors' views that stubborn inflation may push the BOJ to roll back monetary stimulus before long.翻译:这强化了投资者的观点，即顽固的通胀可能会促使日本央行不久后取消货币刺激措施。

The Asian currency has slowly crawled away from the near 33-year low of 151.92 it touched at the start of last week and is up 1.5% for the month.翻译:亚洲货币已从上周初触及的近 33 年低点 151.92 缓慢回升，本月上涨 1.5%。

ING economists said they expect the BOJ to move away from its super-accommodative stance next year.翻译:ING经济学家表示，他们预计日本央行明年将放弃超级宽松立场。

"We believe that the BOJ may scrap the yield curve programme as early as the first quarter of next (year), as Japanese government bonds appear to have stabilised," they said.翻译:他们表示：“我们认为，日本央行最早可能在明年第一季度取消收益率曲线计划，因为日本政府债券似乎已经企稳。”

The bank will "then begin its first rate hike in Q2 2024 if wage growth continues to accelerate next year".翻译:如果明年工资增长继续加速，该银行将“在 2024 年第二季度开始首次加息”。

The nationwide core consumer price index (CPI), which excludes volatile fresh food costs, rose 2.9% year-on-year in October, government data showed on Friday, against 3.0% expected by economists in a Reuters poll.翻译:政府周五公布的数据显示，10月份全国核心消费者价格指数（CPI）（不包括波动较大的生鲜食品成本）同比上涨2.9%，而路透调查中经济学家的预期为3.0%。

Japan's factory activity shrank for a sixth straight month in November, while modest growth in the service sector was little changed, a business survey showed on Friday, highlighting the fragility of the economy amid soft demand and inflation.翻译:周五的一项商业调查显示，日本11月份工厂活动连续第六个月萎缩，而服务业的温和增长几乎没有变化，凸显了需求疲软和通胀背景下经济的脆弱性。

The euro also flattened at $1.0909, after data confirmed an initial estimate published in late October that showed Germany's economy shrank slightly in the third quarter compared with the previous three months.翻译:数据证实了 10 月底公布的初步估计，显示德国第三季度经济较前三个月略有萎缩，欧元也持平于 1.0909 美元。

Separate data showed German business morale improved for a third straight month in November.翻译:另一项数据显示，11 月份德国企业士气连续第三个月有所改善。

The single currency is pausing for breath after gaining some ground on Thursday after a series of preliminary surveys showed recession in Germany may be shallower than expected, which offset a downbeat reading on French business activity.翻译:一系列初步调查显示德国经济衰退可能比预期要浅，这抵消了法国商业活动的悲观预期，周四欧元获得了一些进展，目前正在暂停喘息。

Sterling rose for a second consecutive day, up 0.2% to $1.2559, after data showed on Thursday that British companies returned to growth in November, fuelling hopes Britain will avoid a recession.翻译:周四数据显示英国企业11月份恢复增长，激发了英国避免经济衰退的希望，英镑连续第二天上涨0.2%至1.2559美元。

Reporting by Ankur Banerjee in Singapore and Joice Alves in London; Editing by Jan Harvey and David Evans翻译:Ankur Banerjee 在新加坡和 Joice Alves 在伦敦的报道；扬·哈维和大卫·埃文斯编辑

item.title: 巴拿马最高法院权衡对第一量子铜矿合同的挑战
item.description:
Panama's top court is expected to start deliberations on Friday to rule on several constitutional challenges to First Quantum Minerals' (FM.TO) contract for the Cobre Panama mine, an outcome keenly watched by the global copper market and investors.翻译:巴拿马最高法院预计将于周五开始审议，对第一量子矿业(FM.TO)巴拿马铜矿合同的多项宪法挑战作出裁决，这一结果受到全球铜市场和投资者的密切关注。

First Quantum has faced massive protests since the Panama government signed a new contract for the Cobre Panama mine on Oct. 20, amid allegations of corruption and lack of transparency in the negotiations. The company has denied any wrongdoing.翻译:自巴拿马政府于 10 月 20 日签署巴拿马 Cobre 矿场新合同以来，第一量子就面临大规模抗议，原因是谈判中存在腐败和缺乏透明度的指控。该公司否认有任何不当行为。

Cobre Panama is one of the world's biggest and newest copper mines, producing about 1% of global copper supply.翻译:巴拿马 Cobre 是世界上最大、最新的铜矿之一，生产的铜约占全球铜供应量的 1%。

A majority of lawyers surveyed by Reuters this month said the Supreme Court is likely to rule against the company, citing a precedent. The court has not given a timeline to release the verdict, but some lawyers and officials expect a decision in the coming days or weeks.翻译:路透社本月调查的大多数律师表示，最高法院可能会引用先例对该公司做出不利于该公司的裁决。法院尚未给出公布判决的时间表，但一些律师和官员预计将在未来几天或几周内做出决定。

A ruling against First Quantum will have huge implications. The uncertainty has already wiped about C$10 billion ($7.3 billion), or 50% of its market value, in about a month, impacted copper prices and could be a blow to the Central American nation as the mine accounts for about 5% of its GDP.翻译:对第一量子的裁决将产生巨大影响。这种不确定性已经在大约一个月内蒸发了约 100 亿加元（合 73 亿美元），即其市值的 50%，影响了铜价，并可能对这个中美洲国家造成打击，因为该矿约占其总市值的 5%。国内生产总值。

China's Jiangxi Copper Co (600362.SS) is First Quantum's biggest shareholder.翻译:中国江西铜业股份有限公司（600362.SS）是第一量子的最大股东。

The demonstrations have turned into an anti-government movement, with protesters demanding an end to all mining activity in the country.翻译:示威活动已演变为反政府运动，抗议者要求结束该国所有采矿活动。

The movement has also gained support from Hollywood actor Leonardo Di Caprio, who last weekend shared a video from an environmental group that called for the Supreme Court to cancel the contract.翻译:该运动还获得了好莱坞演员莱昂纳多·迪卡普里奥的支持，他上周末分享了一个环保组织的视频，呼吁最高法院取消合同。

On Thursday, First Quantum said the mine is not operating at commercial levels, following blockades by protesters at a key port that have prevented the miner from receiving shipments of coal that power the site and other supplies.翻译:周四，第一量子表示，抗议者封锁了一个重要港口，导致该矿无法接收为该矿场提供动力的煤炭和其他供应品，该矿目前尚未达到商业运营水平。

The contested contract provides First Quantum a 20-year mining right with an option to extend for another 20 years, in return for $375 million in annual revenue to Panama.翻译:这份有争议的合同为 First Quantum 提供了 20 年的采矿权，并可选择再延长 20 年，以换取巴拿马每年 3.75 亿美元的收入。

If the court deems the contract unconstitutional, Panama would be in a tricky spot, lawyers said, as the government on Nov. 3 signed a bill banning all new mining concessions and extensions. That would prevent the two parties from negotiating a new deal.翻译:律师表示，如果法院认为该合同违宪，巴拿马将陷入困境，因为政府于 11 月 3 日签署了一项法案，禁止所有新的采矿特许权和延期。这将阻止两党就新协议进行谈判。

The contract was inherited by First Quantum in 2013 after it became the operator of the mine. However, Panama's top court in 2017 deemed unconstitutional the law under which First Quantum was operating the mine.翻译:该合同于2013年成为该矿场运营商后由第一量子继承。然而，巴拿马最高法院于 2017 年裁定第一量子运营该矿所依据的法律违宪。

The ruling was upheld in 2021, resulting in last month's fresh deal with the government.翻译:该裁决于 2021 年得到维持，导致上个月与政府达成了新协议。

item.title: 早盘竞价：感谢你没有投资中国股票
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望

As Americans take a quick peek at markets on Friday before resuming a long Thanksgiving weekend, the takeaway will be sustained stock gains, punchier bond yields and a deepening underperformance of Chinese equities.翻译:周五美国人在感恩节长周末恢复之前快速浏览一下市场，结果将是股市持续上涨、债券收益率走强以及中国股市表现进一步不佳。

U.S. financial markets re-open after Thanksgiving for a truncated "Black Friday" trading session, where there will likely be as much focus on demand on High Street as Wall St.翻译:美国金融市场在感恩节后重新开放，迎来一个被缩短的“黑色星期五”交易时段，届时高街的需求可能会像华尔街一样受到关注。

But subdued market volatility, that saw the VIX "fear index" (.VIX) clock a post-pandemic closing low on Wednesday at just 12.75, was helped by signs of some calming of geopolitical tensions. A four-day ceasefire between Israel and Hamas appeared to be holding shakily on Friday with no major reports of attacks, although both sides were accused of violations.翻译:但地缘政治紧张局势有所缓解的迹象有助于市场波动减弱，周三 VIX“恐惧指数” (.VIX)创下疫情后收盘低点，仅为 12.75。以色列和哈马斯之间为期四天的停火似乎在周五不稳定，没有重大袭击报告，尽管双方都被指控违反协议。

Oil prices, which had lunged sharply lower again over the past two days amid a chaotic postponement of this weekend's OPEC+ meeting, held steady on Friday and U.S. crude hovered just above $76 per barrel.翻译:由于本周末 OPEC+ 会议混乱推迟，过去两天油价再次大幅下跌，但周五保持稳定，美国原油徘徊在每桶 76 美元上方。

But with seasonal retail now in focus for many stock and economy watchers, S&P500 futures were higher ahead of the open and look set to extend gains to their highest in almost four months - and potentially on course for their best month in three years.翻译:但由于季节性零售现在成为许多股票和经济观察人士关注的焦点，标准普尔 500 指数期货在开盘前走高，并且有望将涨幅扩大至近四个月来的最高水平 - 并有可能创下三年来最好的月份。

Better-than-forecast flash European business readings for November, released on Thursday, tee up equivalent surveys later in the day for the United States and may be contributing to a back-up in bond yields.翻译:周四发布的欧洲 11 月份商业数据好于预期，为当天晚些时候美国的类似调查做好准备，并可能有助于支撑债券收益率。

With some $148 billion of new 2-, 5- and 7-year Treasury notes up for auction next week, benchmark 10-year yields were about 5 basis points higher at 4.48% ahead of Friday's shortened session. The dollar index (.DXY) remained under wraps, however, and edged lower.翻译:下周将拍卖约 1,480 亿美元的新 2 年期、5 年期和 7 年期国债，基准 10 年期国债收益率在周五缩短交易日之前上涨约 5 个基点，至 4.48%。然而，美元指数（.DXY）仍处于保密状态，并小幅走低。

But with most overseas stocks steady to higher, perhaps the most eye-catching moves involved the relentless drain on Chinese stocks (.CSI300) - which recorded their lowest close in almost a month and are now underperforming the MSCI all-country index (.MIWD00000PUS) by almost 20% for 2023 to date.翻译:但随着大多数海外股票稳步走高，也许最引人注目的走势涉及中国股票（.CSI300）的持续下跌 - 该股票创下近一个月来的最低收盘价，目前表现逊于 MSCI 所有国家指数（.MIWD00000PUS） ）到 2023 年迄今为止，增长近 20%。

With data showing plunging foreign direct investment into the world's second-largest economy this year, Friday saw overseas investors selling another net 6.2 billion yuan ($859.79 million) of Chinese shares via the Stock Connect - the biggest daily outflow in more than one month.翻译:由于数据显示今年对全球第二大经济体的外国直接投资大幅下降，周五海外投资者通过沪港通再次净售人民币 62 亿元（合 8.5979 亿美元）的中国股票，这是一个多月以来最大的单日流出量。

The decline marked yet another investor shrug at reports of further official moves to shore up China's ailing property sector.翻译:此次下跌标志着投资者再次对官方采取进一步措施提振中国陷入困境的房地产行业的报道不以为然。

The Hang Seng Mainland Properties Index (.HSMPI) dropped 2.2% even after Bloomberg News reported on Thursday that Beijing might allow banks to offer unsecured short-term loans to qualified property developers for the first time.翻译:尽管彭博社周四报道北京可能首次允许银行向合格的房地产开发商提供无抵押短期贷款，恒生内地房地产指数（.HSMPI）还是下跌了 2.2%。

Tension ahead of next year's Taiwan elections didn't help. Taiwan opposition parties, which seek closer China ties, registered separate presidential candidates on Friday after a dramatic split, potentially easing the way for the ruling party, which has defied Beijing's pressure, to stay in power.翻译:明年台湾选举之前的紧张局势也无济于事。寻求与中国建立更密切关系的台湾反对党在戏剧性分裂后于周五登记了单独的总统候选人，这可能为不顾北京压力的执政党继续执政铺平道路。

U.S. chip giant Nvidia has told customers in China it is delaying the launch of a new artificial intelligence chip it designed to comply with U.S. export rules until the first quarter of next year, according to Reuters sources.翻译:据路透社消息人士称，美国芯片巨头英伟达已告知中国客户，它将推迟至明年第一季度推出一款新的人工智能芯片，该芯片旨在遵守美国出口规则。

In Europe, data showed Germany's economy shrank slightly in the third quarter, confirming an initial estimate of a 0.1% fall. Finance Minister Christian Lindner is set to propose a supplementary budget for this year, which includes the suspension of limits on new borrowing after a budgetary crisis caused by a court ruling last week.翻译:欧洲方面，数据显示德国经济第三季度小幅萎缩，证实了最初预计的下降0.1%。财政部长克里斯蒂安·林德纳(Christian Lindner)将提出今年的补充预算，其中包括在法院上周裁决引发预算危机后暂停对新借款的限制。

Dutch party leaders met on Friday for the first time since anti-Islam populist Geert Wilders won Wednesday's elections to begin the difficult and lengthy process of building a coalition.翻译:荷兰各党领导人周五举行了自反伊斯兰民粹主义者吉尔特·维尔德斯赢得周三选举以来的首次会面，开始了艰难而漫长的建立联盟的进程。

In banking, Britain's Barclays (BARC.L) is working on plans to save up to 1 billion pounds ($1.25 billion) - which could involve cutting as many as 2,000 jobs, mainly in the British bank's back office.翻译:在银行业， 英国巴克莱银行 (Barclays ) (BARC.L)正在制定节省高达 10 亿英镑（12.5 亿美元）的计划，这可能涉及裁员多达 2,000 个，主要是在英国银行的后台部门。

Key developments that should provide more direction to U.S. markets later on Friday:翻译:主要事态发展将为周五晚些时候的美国市场提供更多方向：

* U.S. flash Nov business surveys from S&PGlobal翻译:* 标准普尔全球公司 11 月份美国商业调查快报

* European Central Bank vice president Luis de Guindos and Bank of Spain governor Pablo Hernandez de Cos speak翻译:* 欧洲央行副行长路易斯·德金多斯和西班牙央行行长巴勃罗·埃尔南德斯·德科斯发表讲话

* U.S. corporate earnings: HWorld翻译:* 美国企业盈利：HWorld

item.title: 中国对法国、德国、意大利公民实行免签入境政策
item.description:
China will temporarily exempt citizens of France, Germany, Italy, the Netherlands, Spain and Malaysia from needing visas to visit the world's second-largest economy in a bid to give a boost to post-pandemic tourism.翻译:中国将暂时免去法国、德国、意大利、荷兰、西班牙和马来西亚公民前往世界第二大经济体的签证，以提振疫情后的旅游业。

From Dec. 1 to Nov. 30 next year, citizens of those countries entering China for business, tourism, visiting relatives and friends, or transiting for no more than 15 days, will not need a visa, a foreign ministry spokesperson said on Friday.翻译:外交部发言人周五表示，从12月1日至明年11月30日，这些国家的公民入境中国商务、旅游、探亲访友或过境不超过15天，将不再需要签证。

China has been taking steps in recent months - including restoring international flight routes - to revive its tourism sector following three years of strict COVID-19 measures that largely shut its borders to the outside world.翻译:近几个月来，中国一直在采取措施，包括恢复国际航线，以重振旅游业，此前三年，中国针对新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 采取了严格的措施，基本上对外界关闭了边境。

The government is also looking to re-establish its image around the world after clashing with many Western countries on various issues including COVID, human rights, Taiwan and trade.翻译:在与许多西方国家在新冠病毒、人权、台湾和贸易等问题上发生冲突后，政府还寻求在世界各地重新树立形象。

A recent Pew Research Center survey in 24 countries revealed that views of China were broadly negative, with 67% of adults expressing unfavourable views.翻译:皮尤研究中心最近在 24 个国家进行的一项调查显示，人们对中国的看法普遍持负面态度，67% 的成年人表达了负面看法。

More than half of the respondents said China interfered in the affairs of other countries and did not take into account the interests of others.翻译:超过一半的受访者表示，中国干涉别国事务，不考虑别国利益。

"This decision will facilitate travel to China for many German citizens to an unprecedented extent," Germany's ambassador to China, Patricia Flor, said on the social media platform X, formerly known as Twitter.翻译:德国驻华大使帕特里夏·弗洛（Patricia Flor）在社交媒体平台X（原名Twitter）上表示：“这一决定将为许多德国公民前往中国提供前所未有的便利。”

"We hope that the Chinese government will implement the measures announced today for all EU member states," she said.翻译:“我们希望中国政府为所有欧盟成员国落实今天宣布的措施，”她说。

Visa-free travel to Germany for Chinese nationals would only be possible if all members of the European Schengen Agreement approved, she said.翻译:她说，只有欧洲申根协定所有成员国都批准，中国公民才能免签前往德国。

French Foreign Minister Catherine Colonna, who is in Beijing, wrote on X: "An excellent new announcement on the occasion of my visit from my counterpart Wang Yi!"翻译:正在北京的法国外长凯瑟琳·科隆纳在 X 上写道：“在我访问之际，我的外交部长王毅发布了一个非常好的新消息！”

This month, China expanded its visa-free transit policy to 54 countries to include citizens of Norway.翻译:本月，中国将过境免签政策扩大到54个国家，其中包括挪威公民。

In August, China scrapped all COVID test requirements for inbound travellers. It resumed 15-day visa-free entry for citizens of Singapore and Brunei in July.翻译:8月，中国取消了对入境旅客的所有新冠病毒检测要求。 7月恢复对新加坡和文莱公民15天免签证入境。

International flights in and out the country, while recovering more slowly than services on the domestic network, have been picking up.翻译:进出该国的国际航班虽然恢复速度慢于国内网络的服务，但一直在回升。

China's aviation authority said in October that 16,680 weekly flights were expected from November through March, with passenger flights expected to reach 71% of the total four years ago.翻译:中国航空管理局10月表示，预计11月至3月每周航班数量为16,680架次，客运航班量预计将达到四年前总数的71%。

The European Chamber of Commerce in China also said the move would help boost business confidence. "It is a positive that the authorities are taking steps to facilitate people-to-people exchanges," it added.翻译:中国欧盟商会也表示，此举将有助于提振企业信心。声明补充说：“当局正在采取措施促进民间交流，这是积极的。”

item.title: 第五点：为这个冬天预热
item.description:
Investors are torn over when global interest rates are likely to start falling, which is weighing on the dollar at a seasonally tricky time of year, meaning upcoming inflation data will be more important than ever, while China mulls its growth outlook.翻译:当全球利率可能开始下降时，投资者感到左右为难，在一年中季节性的棘手时期，这对美元构成压力，这意味着即将发布的通胀数据将比以往任何时候都更加重要，而中国正在考虑其增长前景。

World leaders gather in Dubai for a summit on climate change, but any agreement on how to deal with it or pay to tackle it seems a distant prospect.翻译:世界领导人齐聚迪拜，召开气候变化峰会，但就如何应对气候变化或支付费用解决问题达成任何协议似乎仍遥不可及。

Here's your week ahead in world markets from Lewis Krauskopf in New York, Kevin Buckland in Tokyo, and Naomi Rovnick, Marc Jones and Amanda Cooper in London.

1\BUCK UP, IT'S DECEMBER

The dollar is heading for its weakest monthly performance for a year, with a loss so far of 2.7%. The prospect of a rapid flip to rate cuts by the Federal Reserve next year has driven investors into beaten-down Treasuries , pushing yields down by the most in a month in four years and boosting stocks (.SPX), at the expense of the dollar. The timing of this combination looks tricky for the greenback.翻译:美元正走向一年来最弱的月度表现，迄今为止已下跌 2.7%。美联储明年迅速转向降息的前景已促使投资者买入遭受重创的美国国债，导致收益率创四年来单月最大跌幅，并提振股市（.SPX） ，但美元贬值。对于美元来说，这种组合的时机看起来很棘手。

Seasonally, December is the worst month for dollar performance. Since 1973, the dollar has lost an average of 0.9% in December. But it does tend to recover those losses in January, with an average gain of 0.98%.翻译:从季节性来看，12 月是美元表现最差的月份。自1973年以来，12月美元平均贬值0.9%。但它确实倾向于在 1 月份收复这些损失，平均涨幅为 0.98%。

The stats don't favour a three-, or even a two-month, drop. There have been 16 years in which the dollar has fallen in November and December, but only four when it's fallen in November, December and the January of the following year.

2\CHINA'S DRIVE FOR FIVE

Despite the massive economic headwinds from a teetering property market and tepid domestic demand, compounded by record youth unemployment, China's top economic adviser plans to recommend a 5% growth target for a second year, Reuters exclusively reported on Nov 22.翻译:据路透社 11 月 22 日独家报道，尽管房地产市场摇摇欲坠、 内需不温不火给经济带来巨大阻力，再加上创纪录的青年失业率，中国最高经济顾问仍计划建议第二年实现 5% 的增长目标。

To get there though, they say more fiscal stimulus is needed, as next year's number won't be flattered by the low base effect of 2021's stringent COVID-19 lockdowns. Markets clearly expect the same, with mainland equities drifting lower as investors bide their time.翻译:不过，他们表示，要实现这一目标，需要采取更多财政刺激措施，因为 2021 年严格的 COVID-19 封锁带来的低基数效应不会让明年的数字感到满意。市场显然也有同样的预期，随着投资者观望，内地股市走低。

So far, support measures have largely fallen short, meaning meeting this year's growth target will also be tight. On Thursday, China releases official manufacturing PMI data, which last month showed an unexpected contraction, killing momentum for an economic recovery.

3\EVEN COOLER THAN BEFORE

On the heels of an encouraging report on consumer prices, markets are hoping that another relatively tame U.S. inflation report can support the end of the Federal Reserve's interest rate hiking campaign.翻译:继一份令人鼓舞的消费者价格报告之后，市场希望另一份相对温和的美国通胀报告能够支持美联储加息行动的结束。

The personal consumption expenditures (PCE) price index, due on Nov 30, is expected to show no change in October from the prior month, according to a Reuters poll. The PCE index rose 0.4% in September, matching the rise in August.翻译:路透调查显示，11 月 30 日到期的个人消费支出 (PCE) 价格指数预计 10 月份与上月相比没有变化。 9 月份 PCE 指数上涨 0.4%，与 8 月份的涨幅持平。

Another key inflation gauge, the consumer price index (CPI), was unchanged in October, lifting equity prices, as it bolstered the view that the Fed was probably done raising interest rates.翻译:另一个关键的通胀指标——消费者价格指数（CPI）在 10 月份没有变化，提振了股价，因为它支持了美联储可能已经结束加息的观点。

As investors assess how much the economy may be cooling, other key economic reports due in the coming days include a consumer confidence index on Nov 28. The October reading showed a third-straight monthly decline.

4\GOOD COP, BAD COP?

COP28 gets underway in Dubai and securing an agreement on how to tackle global warming and, crucially, how to pay for it looks as difficult as ever for the near 200 countries and institutions attending.翻译:COP28 在迪拜如火如荼地进行，对于近 200 个与会国家和机构来说，就如何应对全球变暖以及最重要的是如何支付费用达成协议，看起来一如既往地困难。

The main goals set out by COP President - and UAE oil boss - Sultan Ahmed Al Jaber are to speed up the move away from fossil fuels; supercharge climate finance; preserve biodiversity and a fabled "loss and damage" fund to ensure the poorest and most vulnerable countries are not left to fend for themselves.翻译:COP 主席兼阿联酋石油老板Sultan Ahmed Al Jaber制定的主要目标是加快摆脱化石燃料；加强气候融资；保护生物多样性和所谓的“损失和损害”基金，以确保最贫穷和最脆弱的国家不会自生自灭。

With no consensus likely and pessimism around the key 1.5 degree warming target, the best that can be hoped for might be more money and focus from the big multilateral institutions like the World Bank, as well as deals on uncontroversial areas like tripling global renewable energy capacity.

5\THE ECB'S BALANCING ACT

Euro zone inflation data on Nov. 30 may well confirm a trend of price rises moderating.翻译:11 月 30 日的欧元区通胀数据很可能证实物价上涨趋势放缓。

But if traders react by bringing forward bets on when the European Central Bank might cut interest rates, expect monetary policymakers to push back.翻译:但如果交易员做出反应，提前押注欧洲央行何时可能降息，预计货币政策制定者将予以反击。

After the ostensibly good news that consumer price rises slowed to 2.9% in October, ECB president Christine Lagarde warned borrowing costs would need to stay restrictive for many months ahead.翻译:在 10 月份消费者物价涨幅放缓至 2.9% 的表面好消息传出后，欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜·拉加德 (Christine Lagarde) 警告称，未来几个月借贷成本需要保持限制性。

On Nov. 21, ECB officials were talking down market expectations that the central bank would lower its main deposit rate from a record 4% as soon as April 2024.翻译:11 月 21 日，欧洲央行官员淡化了市场预期，即央行最早将于 2024 年 4 月将主要存款利率从创纪录的 4% 下调。

Policymakers remain wary of any hopes for rate cuts spilling over into increased bank lending and household spending, renewing inflationary pressures.翻译:政策制定者仍对任何降息希望蔓延至银行贷款和家庭支出增加、再度引发通胀压力持谨慎态度。

Euro zone bond yields, stuck in a narrow range, are predicting that this tug of war between market optimism and central bank caution will continue for quite some time.翻译:欧元区债券收益率窄幅波动，预计市场乐观情绪与央行谨慎情绪之间的拉锯战将持续相当长一段时间。

item.title: 中国应对呼吸道疾病激增，世卫组织称未发现异常病原体
item.description:
China called for vigilance on Friday as a surge of respiratory illness hit schools and hospitals and the World Health Organization, which has asked the government for disease data, said no unusual or novel pathogens had been detected.翻译:周五，随着呼吸道疾病激增袭击学校和医院，中国呼吁保持警惕，世界卫生组织已要求政府提供疾病数据，表示尚未发现异常或新型病原体。

China is grappling with a spike in respiratory illnesses as it enters its first full winter season since it lifted strict COVID-19 restrictions in December, with cases among children appearing especially high in northern areas like Beijing and Liaoning province where hospitals are warning of long waits.翻译:中国正面临呼吸道疾病激增的问题，自去年 12 月取消严格的 COVID-19 限制以来，中国进入了第一个完整的冬季，其中北京和辽宁省等北方地区的儿童病例数量尤其多，医院警告称，这些地区的儿童病例可能需要长时间等待。

The State Council said influenza would peak this winter and spring and mycoplasma pneumoniae infection would continue to be high in some areas in future. It also warned of the risk of a rebound in COVID infections.翻译:国务院表示，今冬春季流感高峰期，未来部分地区肺炎支原体感染仍将持续高发。它还警告了新冠病毒感染反弹的风险。

"All localities should strengthen information reporting on infectious diseases to ensure information is reported in a timely and accurate manner," the State Council said in a statement.翻译:国务院在一份声明中表示：“各地要加强传染病信息报告，确保信息报告及时、准确。”

The situation came into the spotlight this week when the WHO asked China for more information, citing a report by the Program for Monitoring Emerging Diseases (ProMED) on clusters of undiagnosed pneumonia in children.翻译:本周，当世界卫生组织援引新发疾病监测计划（ProMED）关于儿童未确诊肺炎群的报告要求中国提供更多信息时，这一情况成为人们关注的焦点。

Both China and the WHO have faced questions about the transparency of reporting on the earliest COVID-19 cases that emerged in the central city of Wuhan in late 2019.翻译:中国和世界卫生组织都面临着关于 2019 年底在中部城市武汉出现的最早的 COVID-19 病例报告透明度的质疑。

On Thursday, the WHO said China had responded to its request and the data it provided suggested the cases were linked to the lifting of COVID curbs along with the circulation of known pathogens like mycoplasma pneumoniae, a common bacterial infection that typically affects children, which has circulated since May.翻译:周四，世界卫生组织表示，中国已回应其要求，其提供的数据表明，这些病例与取消新冠疫情限制以及肺炎支原体等已知病原体的传播有关，肺炎支原体是一种常见的细菌感染，通常影响儿童， 5月以来流传。

This month, authorities began issuing health advisories saying they were paying attention to the situation and warning the public of long waits and the risk of cross-infection at crowded hospitals but they have not imposed measures like the ones during the COVID pandemic, such as masks or closing schools.翻译:本月，当局开始发布健康建议，称他们正在关注局势，并警告公众不要在拥挤的医院长时间等待和交叉感染的风险，但他们没有采取像新冠病毒大流行期间那样的措施，例如戴口罩或关闭学校。

There has been no indication of any undue public alarm.翻译:没有迹象表明任何公众过度恐慌。

Bruce Thompson, head of the Melbourne School of Health Sciences at the University of Melbourne, said very preliminary data suggested there was nothing out of the ordinary.翻译:墨尔本大学墨尔本健康科学学院院长布鲁斯·汤普森表示，非常初步的数据表明没有什么异常。

"At this stage, there is nothing to suggest that it may be a new variant of COVID," he said.翻译:他说：“现阶段，没有任何迹象表明它可能是新冠病毒的新变种。”

"One thing to note is that we can be reassured that the surveillance processes are working, which is a very good thing."翻译:“值得注意的是，我们可以放心，监控流程正在发挥作用，这是一件非常好的事情。”

Parents in Shanghai on Friday said they were not overly concerned about the wave of sickness, saying while it appeared to be more severe, they expected it to blow over soon.翻译:周五，上海的家长们表示，他们并不太担心这波疫情，虽然疫情看起来更加严重，但他们预计疫情很快就会过去。

"Colds happen all over the world," said Emily Wu outside a children's hospital. "I hope that people will not be biased because of the pandemic ... but look at this from a scientific perspective."翻译:“世界各地都会发生感冒，”艾米丽·吴在儿童医院外说道。 “我希望人们不会因为疫情而产生偏见……但要从科学的角度看待这个问题。”

Another mother, Feng Zixun, said she was making her eight-year-old son wear a mask and wash his hands more often but nothing much more.翻译:另一位母亲冯子勋说，她只是让八岁的儿子戴口罩、勤洗手，仅此而已。

"It's not that bad, there are more children falling sick now but it's mainly an issue of protection," she said.翻译:“情况并没有那么糟糕，现在有更多的孩子生病，但这主要是一个保护问题，”她说。

Reporting by Andrew Silver and Nicoco Chan in Shanghai and the Beijing Newsroom; writing by Brenda Goh; Editing by Robert Birsel翻译:Andrew Silver 和 Nicoco Chan 在上海和北京新闻编辑室的报道；布伦达·吴 (Brenda Goh) 撰写；罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑

item.title: 大众汽车将推出针对中国的入门级电动平台
item.description:
Volkswagen (VOWG_p.DE) said on Friday it will develop a new platform for entry-level electric vehicles in China and use more local components to lower costs, as the German company seeks to regain lost ground in the world's biggest auto market.翻译:大众汽车(VOWG_p.DE)周五表示，它将在中国开发一个用于入门级电动汽车的新平台，并使用更多本地零部件来降低成本，这家德国公司寻求收复全球最大汽车市场的失地。

The new architecture, known as the A Main Platform, will be made specifically to Chinese consumer tastes with regards to the battery, electric drive and electric motor, China chief Ralf Brandstaetter told reporters during a visit to its new EV development and procurement centre in the central city of Hefei.翻译:中国区总裁拉尔夫·布兰德斯塔特(Ralf Brandstaetter)在参观其位于印度的新电动汽车开发和采购中心时告诉记者，被称为“A主平台”的新架构将专门针对中国消费者在电池、电力驱动和电动机方面的品味而设计。中心城市合肥。

Chinese new car buyers are younger, tech savvy and like a immersive digital experience from their cars, he added.翻译:他补充说，中国新车购买者更年轻，懂科技，喜欢汽车带来的沉浸式数字体验。

Derived from the so-called modular electric drive matrix (MEB), Volkswagen's existing electric-only platform in use since 2019, it will primarily use Chinese suppliers and should be ready for market in 2026, a third faster than previous platform development times, he added.翻译:他表示，该平台源自所谓的模块化电动驱动矩阵（MEB），这是大众汽车自 2019 年以来使用的现有纯电动平台，将主要使用中国供应商，预计将于 2026 年上市，比之前的平台开发时间快三分之一。添加。

The company has said it plans to introduce 10 more EV models globally by 2026 and speed up its time to market for new models from four years to closer to the 2.5-year average for its Chinese counterparts.翻译:该公司表示，计划到 2026 年在全球再推出10 款电动车型，并将新车型的上市时间从 4 年缩短到接近中国同行 2.5 年的平均水平。

China was a very “price-sensitive” market and Volkswagen needed to optimise costs, Brandstaetter said.翻译:布兰德斯塔特表示，中国是一个“价格非常敏感”的市场，大众汽车需要优化成本。

“When (EV) volume goes up, … it’s important that we are profitable to be sustainable. Therefore we drive the technologies, the speed and cost efficiency."翻译:“当（电动汽车）销量上升时……我们必须盈利才能可持续发展。因此，我们推动技术、速度和成本效率。”

Ludger Luehrmann, chief technology officer of the Hefei centre that is called Volkswagen Group China Technology Company (VCTC) and is developing the platform, said for example that the company was able to lower the price of its dashboard displays by 37% after switching to a Chinese supplier from a global one.翻译:正在开发该平台的大众汽车集团中国科技公司（VCTC）合肥中心首席技术官 Ludger Luehrmann 表示，例如，在改用来自全球的中国供应商。

Volkswagen ceded its title as the best-selling car brand in China to BYD (002594.SZ) late last year, due to intense competition with local EV makers and its heavy reliance on gasoline vehicles whose sales have been declining in the country.翻译:去年年底，由于大众汽车与本土电动汽车制造商的激烈竞争以及对汽油车的严重依赖，而汽油车在中国的销量一直在下降，大众汽车将其中国最畅销汽车品牌的头衔让给了比亚迪(002594.SZ) 。

Its top-selling EV, the ID.3, ranked 22nd among EV models by sales in China this year after big discounts boosted its monthly sales to around 10,000 during July to October from an average of 2,200 per month last year, according to industry data.

ENTRY-LEVEL MODELS

Volkswagen is pushing to expand its product range in China to attract customers in the entry- and mid-level segment of EVs in particular, with its current offering priced above that of many Chinese electric-only rivals.翻译:大众汽车正在努力扩大其在中国的产品范围，特别是吸引入门级和中级电动汽车领域的客户，其目前的产品价格高于许多中国纯电动竞争对手。

It plans to develop four models priced between 140,000 yuan ($19,400) and 170,000 yuan on the new platform to compete with rivals in a segment dominated by gasoline cars currently, Brandstaetter said.翻译:Brandstaetter 表示，该公司计划在新平台上开发四款售价在 14 万元（19,400 美元）至 17 万元之间的车型，以与目前由汽油车主导的细分市场中的竞争对手竞争。

The cars would be produced by Volkswagen's joint ventures with SAIC (600104.SS) and FAW, he added.翻译:他补充说，这些汽车将由大众汽车与上汽集团（600104.SS）和一汽集团的合资企业生产。

Volkswagen invested around 1 billion euros ($1.1 billion) to build VCTC, which it says is crucial to its 'China for China strategy' and will eventually employ over 2,000 people.翻译:大众汽车投资约 10 亿欧元（11 亿美元）建立 VCTC，该公司表示，这对其“中国为中国战略”至关重要，最终将雇用 2,000 多名员工。

The centre's operations include coordinating procurement to involve suppliers early on, and linking up the development projects of Volkswagen's three joint ventures in China with SAIC, FAW and JAC Motors.翻译:该中心的业务包括协调采购以尽早让供应商参与进来，以及将大众汽车在中国的三个合资企业与上汽、一汽和江淮汽车的开发项目联系起来。

The centre meant that "time-consuming coordination across time zones with developers in Germany is no longer necessary," Brandstaetter said.翻译:布兰德斯塔特表示，该中心意味着“不再需要与德国开发商进行耗时的跨时区协调”。

"We will increase the efficiency of our development processes and be able to shorten the time it takes to bring products to Chinese customers by 30%, while ensuring we are catering to their specific needs."翻译:“我们将提高开发流程的效率，并将产品交付给中国客户的时间缩短 30%，同时确保满足他们的特定需求。”

Volkswagen in July struck a deal with Chinese EV maker Xpeng Inc (9868.HK) to boost its EV line up. It has two new models under development as part of that partnership that will target mid-level consumers and be produced on an older generation Xpeng platform. Those models are set to be rolled out from 2026.翻译:大众汽车于 7 月与中国电动汽车制造商小鹏汽车（9868.HK）达成协议，以扩大其电动汽车产品线。作为该合作伙伴关系的一部分，该公司正在开发两款新车型，这些车型将针对中端消费者，并在老一代小鹏汽车平台上生产。这些型号将于 2026 年开始推出。

($1 = 7.2111 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2111 人民币）

item.title: 菲律宾在南海与美国在其权利安全顾问范围内巡逻
item.description:
The Philippines' joint patrols with the United States in the South China Sea are within Manila's rights, and it will continue to support a free and open Indo-Pacific, its national security adviser said on Friday.翻译:菲律宾国家安全顾问周五表示，菲律宾与美国在南中国海进行联合巡逻是马尼拉的权利，并将继续支持自由开放的印太地区。

The Southeast Asian nation rejects China's assertion that the Philippines enlisted "foreign forces" to patrol the South China Sea, National Security Adviser Eduardo Año said in a statement, responding to Beijing's remarks.翻译:国家安全顾问爱德华多·阿诺在一份声明中回应北京的言论时表示，这个东南亚国家拒绝接受中国关于菲律宾招募“ 外国军队”在南海巡逻的说法。

"The Philippines is not stirring up trouble," Defence Secretary Gilberto Teodoro told reporters. "Our interests are to protect our rights."翻译:“菲律宾没有挑起事端，”国防部长吉尔伯托·特奥多罗告诉记者。 “我们的利益就是保护我们的权利。”

Teodoro said there will be several iterations of joint patrols moving forward.翻译:特奥多罗表示，未来将进行多次联合巡逻。

The treaty allies conducted joint patrols from Tuesday to Thursday in waters near Taiwan and the South China Sea within Manila's exclusive economic zone (EEZ), fanning further tensions with China.翻译:周二至周四，这两个条约盟国在马尼拉专属经济区（EEZ）内的台湾附近海域和南中国海进行了联合巡逻，加剧了与中国的紧张关系。

China claims most of the South China Sea on the basis of a "nine-dash line" that stretches as far as 1,500 km (900 miles) south of its mainland, cutting into the EEZs of rival claimants Brunei, Indonesia, Malaysia, the Philippines and Vietnam.翻译:中国以“九段线”为基础对南海大部分地区拥有主权，该线延伸至其大陆以南1,500公里（900英里），切入了其他声索国文莱、印度尼西亚、马来西亚和菲律宾的专属经济区和越南。

A 2016 arbitral ruling invalidated the claim of China, which does not acknowledge the court's decision.翻译:2016年的仲裁裁决宣告中国的主张无效，但中国不承认法院的裁决。

Reporting by Neil Jerome Morales and Mikhail Flores; Editing by Jamie Freed翻译:尼尔·杰罗姆·莫拉莱斯和米哈伊尔·弗洛雷斯报道；杰米·弗里德编辑

item.title: 郭台铭退出台总统竞选，富士康松了口气
item.description:
Terry Gou, the billionaire founder of tech giant Foxconn (2317.TW), on Friday withdrew from the race to be Taiwan's next president, bringing a sense of relief to the major Apple (AAPL.O) supplier and iPhone manufacturer, sources said.翻译:消息人士称，科技巨头富士康(2317.TW)的亿万富翁创始人郭台铭周五退出了台湾下一任总统的竞选，这给苹果(AAPL.O)主要供应商和 iPhone 制造商带来了一丝安慰。

Gou announced his bid in August, saying he wanted to unite the opposition and ensure the island did not become "the next Ukraine", blaming the ruling Democratic Progressive Party (DPP) for taking Taiwan to the brink of war by antagonising China, which claims the island as its own territory.翻译:郭台铭在八月宣布参选，称他希望团结反对派，确保台湾不会成为“下一个乌克兰”，并指责执政的民进党通过对抗中国将台湾推向战争边缘。将该岛视为自己的领土。

Gou, who only got the go-ahead from the election commission last week after collecting enough valid signatures to run as an independent, said in a statement he was "withdrawing his body but not his spirit".翻译:郭台铭上周在收集了足够的有效签名以独立人士身份参选后才获得选举委员会的批准，他在一份声明中表示，他“撤回了他的身体，但没有撤回他的精神”。

"STOP, RESET, RESTART," he added, using English.翻译:“停止、重置、重新启动，”他用英语补充道。

He did not specify what he would do next in the presidential campaign or who he might back - Hou Yu-ih from Taiwan's largest opposition party the Kuomintang (KMT), or former Taipei mayor Ko Wen-je from the much smaller Taiwan People's Party (TPP).翻译:”跨太平洋伙伴关系协定）。

"Must win! All right? Complete the change of power and change Taiwan," Gou said.翻译:“一定要赢！好吗？完成权力更迭，改变台湾，”郭台铭说。

Ko offered his thanks to Gou in a comment on Gou's Facebook page.翻译:柯在郭台铭的 Facebook 页面上发表评论，表达了对郭台铭的感谢。

"We will definitely win!" Ko added.翻译:“我们一定会赢！”柯补充道。

Despite a massive advertising campaign, which saw his face plastered across Taiwan, Gou consistently polled far behind his rivals.翻译:尽管进行了大规模的广告宣传活动，郭台铭的脸贴满了台湾，但他的民意调查始终远远落后于他的竞争对手。

Although Gou stepped down as Foxconn chief in 2019 and resigned as a board member in early September, he remained the company's largest shareholder.翻译:尽管郭台铭于2019年辞去富士康董事长一职，并于9月初辞去董事会成员职务，但他仍然是该公司第一大股东。

But Gou, one of Taiwan's most high-profile business figures internationally, largely vanished from public view after a Chinese newspaper reported last month that China was investigating Foxconn over taxes and other issues.翻译:但在一家中国报纸上个月报道中国正在就税收和其他问题调查​​富士康后，郭台铭这位台湾在国际上最引人注目的商业人物之一基本上从公众视野中消失了。

The report, in the strongly nationalist Global Times, implied Beijing was unhappy Gou might split the opposition vote, potentially ensuring a victory for the DPP's candidate Lai Ching-te, who is leading in the polls.翻译:强烈民族主义的《环球时报》的这篇报道暗示，北京对郭台铭可能分裂反对派选票感到不满，这有可能确保在民调中领先的民进党候选人赖清德获胜。

Gou's decision on Friday came as a relief for Foxconn's senior management, which had assessed scenarios for potential contingency plans after news of the Chinese inquiry, two people close to Foxconn told Reuters.翻译:两名接近富士康的人士告诉路透社，郭台铭周五的决定让富士康的高级管理层松了一口气，在中国调查的消息传出后，他们已经评估了潜在应急计划的情况。

"It's a sigh of relief," said one of the sources, who declined to be identified due to the sensitivity of the matter.翻译:“这让人松了一口气，”一位消息人士表示，由于此事的敏感性，该消息人士拒绝透露姓名。

"We were previously a little bit unsettled, but this basically puts an end to it," the person said, referring to worries about an escalation of the investigation, which could further affect its operations in China.翻译:这位人士表示：“我们之前有点不安，但这基本上结束了。”他指的是对调查升级的担忧，这可能会进一步影响其在中国的业务。

Foxconn declined to comment.翻译:富士康拒绝置评。

Foxconn Chairman Young Liu told an earnings call last week that the company has "prepared for all possible cases", when asked about potential political risks to the company from Gou's election bid.翻译:当被问及郭台铭竞选给公司带来的潜在政治风险时，富士康董事长刘扬在上周的财报电话会议上表示，该公司已经“为所有可能的情况做好了准备”。

Gou had tried to broker talks between the KMT and TPP to run together against the DPP, but those efforts imploded late Thursday after an angry showdown between leaders from the opposition parties in front of reporters and shown live on Taiwanese television channels at a conference room in a Taipei hotel.翻译:郭台铭曾试图斡旋国民党和跨太平洋伙伴关系党之间的谈判，共同对抗民进党，但这些努力在周四晚间破裂，因为反对党领导人在记者面前愤怒地摊牌，并在台湾电视频道的一间会议室进行了现场直播。台北的一家酒店。

Gou's running mate, the actress Tammy Lai, who starred in a high-profile Netflix drama, had to give up her U.S. citizenship to stand with him.翻译:郭台铭的竞选搭档、女演员黎悦怡 (Tammy Lai) 曾主演一部备受瞩目的 Netflix 电视剧，她不得不放弃美国国籍才能与郭台铭站在一起。

She has no plans to regain her U.S. passport, Lai' office said.翻译:黎智英办公室表示，她没有计划重新获得美国护照。

item.title: 谁将竞选台湾下一任总统？
item.description:
Taiwan will vote on Jan. 13 in presidential and parliamentary elections, held once every four years.翻译:台湾将于1月13日举行每四年举行一次的总统和议会选举。

President Tsai Ing-wen is barred by the constitution from standing against after two terms in office.翻译:宪法禁止蔡英文总统在两届任期后参选。

Here is a list of the candidates standing for president:

LAI CHING-TE

Lai, also widely known by his English name William, is running for the ruling Democratic Progressive Party (DPP). Currently Taiwan's vice president, he is also the DPP's chairman, and has consistently led opinion polls.翻译:黎智英的英文名William也广为人知，他正在竞选执政的民进党（DPP）。现任台湾副总统，同时也是民进党主席，在民意调查中一直领先。

Lai, along with Tsai, has repeatedly offered talks with China but have been rebuffed, as Beijing views them both as separatists.翻译:黎智英和蔡英文曾多次提出与中国进行会谈，但均遭到拒绝，因为北京将他们视为分裂分子。

Lai, 64, and Tsai say only Taiwan's people can decide their future.翻译:64 岁的黎智英和蔡英文表示，只有台湾人民才能决定他们的未来。

His running mate is Hsiao Bi-khim, Taiwan's high-profile former de facto ambassador to the United States.

HOU YU-IH

Hou, 66, is the candidate for Taiwan's main opposition party the Kuomintang (KMT), whose government fled to the island in 1949 after losing a civil war with Mao Zedong's Communists.翻译:66 岁的侯是台湾主要反对党国民党的候选人，国民党政府在与毛泽东领导的共产党的内战中失败后于 1949 年逃往台湾。

Hou is the mayor of Taipei's neighbouring city New Taipei, though he has taken a leave of absence to run for president. He was re-elected as the mayor in a landslide last year.翻译:侯是台北邻近城市新北的市长，不过他已经请假竞选总统。去年他以压倒性优势再次当选市长。

The KMT traditionally favours closer ties with China but strongly denies being pro-Beijing. Hou has said he will restart talks with Beijing.翻译:国民党传统上倾向于与中国建立更密切的关系，但强烈否认亲北京。侯先生表示，他将重启与北京的谈判。

His running mate is the fiery media personality Jaw Shaw-kong.

KO WEN-JE

Ko, a former Taipei mayor, is the candidate for the small Taiwan People's Party.翻译:柯曾任台北市市长，是小型台湾人民党的候选人。

He had been talking to the KMT about a joint ticket to take on the DPP, but those talks collapsed this week in bitter disagreement.翻译:他一直在与国民党讨论联合竞选对抗民进党的问题，但本周谈判因激烈分歧而破裂。

Ko, 64, has chosen as his vice presidential candidate one of the party's lawmakers, Cynthia Wu, whose family is a major shareholder of conglomerate Shin Kong Group.翻译:64 岁的柯选择了党内议员之一吴辛西娅 (Cynthia Wu) 作为副总统候选人，吴辛西娅的家族是新光集团的主要股东。

Ko and Hou have both been battling for second spot in opinion polls behind Lai.翻译:柯和侯一直在民意调查中争夺第二名，仅次于黎智英。

Writing by Ben Blanchard. Editing by Gerry Doyle翻译:本·布兰查德撰写。格里·多伊尔编辑

item.title: 中国法院驳回加拿大流行歌星吴亦凡的上诉
item.description:
A court in China's capital Beijing on Friday denied the appeal of Canadian pop star Kris Wu, who was sentenced to 13 years in prison for crimes including rape, it said in a statement.翻译:中国首都北京一家法院在一份声明中称，周五驳回了加拿大流行歌星吴亦凡的上诉，吴亦凡因强奸等罪名被判处 13 年有期徒刑。

Chinese-born Wu, 33, was a former member of K-pop group EXO and returned to China in 2014, where he built a lucrative career.翻译:33 岁的吴出生于中国，曾是韩国流行音乐组合 EXO 的成员，并于 2014 年返回中国，并在那里建立了一份利润丰厚的职业生涯。

"(Kris) Wu violated the will of women and took advantage of the drunkenness of multiple victims to have sexual relations with them. His behaviour constituted the crime of rape," the Beijing No.3 Intermediate People's Court said.翻译:北京市第三中级人民法院称：“吴某违反妇女意愿，利用多名受害人醉酒时与其发生性关系，其行为已构成强奸罪。”

Wu was detained in July 2021 after an 18-year-old Chinese student publicly accused him of inducing her and other girls, some of them younger than 18, to have sex with him.翻译:2021 年 7 月，一名 18 岁中国学生公开指控吴引诱她和其他女孩（其中一些年龄不到 18 岁）与他发生性关系，随后吴被拘留。

The court said Wu gathered a crowd to engage in lewd activities and was the ringleader, therefore his behaviour constituted the crime of group licentiousness, and it would maintain the original ruling.翻译:法院认为，吴某聚众实施猥亵活动，是首要分子，其行为已构成聚众淫乱罪，维持原判。

Wu's close relatives and officials from the Canadian embassy in China attended the verdict announcement.翻译:吴某的近亲属和加拿大驻华使馆官员旁听了宣判。

Wu, who could not be contacted, has previously denied the accusation. Reuters did not have access to his relatives or his legal representatives for comment, while the Canadian embassy did not respond immediately to a request for comment.翻译:无法联系到吴先生，他此前否认了这一指控。路透社未能联系到他的亲属或法律代表置评，而加拿大大使馆也没有立即回应置评请求。

Consular officials have been actively engaged on Wu's case. The Canadian government said in July that its diplomats were denied access to the start of Wu's appeal trial. Beijing said it notified the embassy of the appeal trial in advance, but it was not open to the public to protect the privacy of the victims.翻译:领事官员一直在积极处理吴的案件。加拿大政府七月表示，其外交官被拒绝旁听吴上诉审判的开始。北京表示，已提前将上诉审理情况通知使馆，但为保护受害者隐私，不向公众公开。

In addition to his pop career, Wu in 2017 made his Hollywood debut in the film "XXX: Return of Xander Cage".翻译:除了流行事业之外，吴于2017年在电影《XXX：桑德·凯奇归来》中首次亮相好莱坞。

At the time of his detention, Wu was an ambassador for 15 brands, such as Bulgari, Lancome, Louis Vuitton and Porsche, all of which immediately severed ties with him.翻译:吴宇森被捕时是宝格丽、兰蔻、路易威登、保时捷等15个品牌的形象大使，这些品牌立即与他断绝了关系。

Taiwan's two main opposition parties on Friday named their vice presidential candidates after talks about running a joint ticket to take on the ruling party failed.翻译:台湾两个主要反对党在联合竞选对抗执政党的谈判失败后，于周五任命了副总统候选人。

item.title: 追逐不一样的中国梦，年轻的数字游民走向山野
item.description:
In this mountain town in China's southwest, drifters and tarot card readers rub shoulders with tech entrepreneurs and artists. Many are former city-dwellers in search of an elusive prize in authoritarian China: Space for open discussion and exchange of ideas.翻译:在中国西南部的这座山城里，漂泊者和塔罗牌占卜师与科技企业家和艺术家擦肩而过。许多人都是前城市居民，在专制中国寻找难以捉摸的奖品：公开讨论和交流思想的空间。

In one co-working space, a group of young adults asked questions about the effect of Trump-era populism on U.S. media during a discussion led by a Chinese journalist about the American position on the Israel-Gaza conflict. In a nearby cafe, others discussed art, sexual harassment and the listlessness of China's youth.翻译:在一个联合办公空间里，一群年轻人在一名中国记者主持的讨论中询问了特朗普时代民粹主义对美国媒体的影响，讨论了美国对以色列-加沙冲突的立场。在附近的一家咖啡馆里，其他人讨论了艺术、性骚扰和中国年轻人的无精打采。

As President Xi Jinping tightens his grip on the restricted personal freedoms of Chinese citizens and the economy stutters, exacerbating a youth unemployment crisis, Dali in Yunnan province has become a haven for those seeking to escape the pressure.翻译:随着习近平主席加强对中国公民个人自由的限制，经济陷入停滞，加剧了青年失业危机，云南省大理已成为那些寻求逃避压力的人的避风港。

They are drawn by the cheap rents, mild climate, stunning scenery and a history of relative tolerance, which were popularised by a television drama this year about a digital nomad.翻译:他们被廉价的租金、温和的气候、迷人的风景和相对宽容的历史所吸引，这些都因今年一部关于数字游牧民族的电视剧而流行。

Dali's Old Town district, administratively part of a city of 650,000, has attracted culture workers since the late 1990s, said Minhua Ling, an expert on Chinese migration at the Geneva Graduate Institute, adding that the normalisation of remote work and Dali's less restrictive policies during China's zero-COVID crackdown also increased its appeal.翻译:日内瓦研究生院中国移民问题专家凌敏华表示，大理老城区是这座拥有 65 万人口的城市的行政一部分，自 20 世纪 90 年代末以来一直吸引着文化工作者。中国的零新冠打击也增加了其吸引力。

In November, searches for "Dali" on WeChat were up 7% from a year ago, having surged some 290% on one day in late July, when many Chinese were booking summer trips.翻译:11 月份，微信上“大理”的搜索量比一年前增长了 7%，7 月底的一天飙升了约 290%，当时许多中国人都在预订夏季旅行。

Reuters interviewed 13 Chinese migrants to Dali, who described a refuge on the fringes of mainstream society, but also one that implicitly challenges Xi's "China Dream" of a prosperous nation ideologically loyal to the Communist Party. Many of them spoke on condition of anonymity for fear of government retaliation.翻译:路透社采访了13名前往大理的中国移民，他们描述了这是一个位于主流社会边缘的避难所，但也暗中挑战了习近平的“中国梦”，即一个在意识形态上忠于共产党的繁荣国家。由于担心政府报复，他们中的许多人都要求匿名。

"When younger generations are materially sufficient but spiritually lost, of course they will seek personal growth and freedom," said Bai Yunxi, a Dali-based 33-year-old civil servant-turned-astrologer.翻译:“当年轻一代物质充足但精神失落时，他们当然会寻求个人成长和自由，”大理33岁的公务员出身的占星师白云熙说。

Six of the people expressed concern about increased police scrutiny of their activities, citing abrupt cancellations of large-scale events and police raids.翻译:其中六人对警方加强对其活动的审查表示担忧，理由是大型活动突然取消和警方突击搜查。

Dali city's propaganda bureau did not respond to a faxed request for comment on the crackdowns and Dali's efforts to attract young skilled workers.

'IDEAL KINGDOM'

With youth unemployment at a record high this summer - when China stopped releasing the statistic - and a stagnant rural population due to low fertility rates and urban migration, Beijing has tried to enlist young people in "rural revitalisation".翻译:今年夏天，青年失业率创历史新高（当时中国停止发布统计数据），而农村人口由于低生育率和城市人口迁移而停滞不前，北京试图让年轻人参与“乡村振兴”。

Xi has urged graduates to "return to their hometowns" and "actively seek hardships", alluding to his experience during the Cultural Revolution. But the message does not appear to resonate with urban youths who grew up with expectations of prosperity but now find social mobility hard to attain.翻译:习近平引用了他在文革期间的经历，敦促毕业生“回到家乡”并“积极吃苦”。但这一信息似乎并没有引起城市年轻人的共鸣，他们在繁荣的期望中长大，但现在发现社会流动性很难实现。

Dali, where several of the people interviewed by Reuters said they found an escape from the conservative social values of rural China, is an exception to the flight of youth to large cities that has occurred since China's economic modernisation.翻译:路透社采访的几位人士表示，大理是中国经济现代化以来年轻人涌向大城市的一个例外，他们在那里找到了逃离中国农村保守社会价值观的地方。

Bai moved to Dali in September, quitting her government job to give online astrology readings. She shares a three-storey house with her partner, a friend and three cats. "My living situation provides enough space to develop my career and personal life without interference from others," she said.翻译:白九月辞去政府工作搬到大理，开始进行在线占星术解读。她与伴侣、一位朋友和三只猫合住一栋三层楼的房子。 “我的生活状况为我发展事业和个人生活提供了足够的空间，不受他人干扰，”她说。

She also referenced Dali's nickname, "Ideal Kingdom" - a pun on its Chinese characters that also reflects its 10th-century status as an independent state - as part of its appeal.翻译:她还提到了大理的绰号“理想王国”——这是一个汉字的双关语，也反映了大理在 10 世纪作为一个独立国家的地位——作为其吸引力的一部分。

Recruitment startup founder Chen Zhengyun, 37, said living in Dali freed him from societal pressure to get married early, as state calls for matrimony grow louder amid China's demographic crisis.翻译:37岁的招聘初创公司创始人陈正云表示，在中国人口危机期间，国家要求结婚的呼声越来越高，住在大理让他摆脱了早婚的社会压力。

"There are some personal topics that you can't bring up elsewhere that you can talk about here," said Chen, adding that the concentration of like-minded young people, social events and tolerance for diverse lifestyles allowed him to explore open relationships.

POLICE OVERSIGHT

The local government has sought to attract young tech talent and in September asked digital nomads for input on policies, two community organisers told Reuters.翻译:两名社区组织者告诉路透社，当地政府一直在寻求吸引年轻科技人才，并于 9 月向数字游牧民征求政策意见。

But the town's population also includes many young people who say they are sceptical of Beijing's attempts to shape their personal lives.翻译:但该镇的居民中也有许多年轻人表示，他们对北京试图塑造他们个人生活的做法持怀疑态度。

A large digital nomad conference with art and tech-related seminars was abruptly cancelled on Nov. 2, a week before its scheduled start, due to "deep consideration of various factors", the organiser, co-working space NCC, wrote on social media.翻译:主办方联合办公空间 NCC 在社交媒体上写道，由于“对各种因素的深入考虑”，一场包含艺术和科技相关研讨会的大型数字游牧者会议于 11 月 2 日突然取消，距离原定开始时间还有一周。 。

NCC declined to elaborate publicly, citing sensitivities.翻译:NCC 以敏感性为由，拒绝公开详细说明。

During a recent visit, Reuters saw a police surveillance camera trained on NCC's main communal area.翻译:在最近的一次访问中，路透社看到警察监控摄像头对准了 NCC 的主要公共区域。

Three people familiar with event organisers in Dali said the November forum - like another conference on decentralised internet technologies planned last year - was cancelled after the government abruptly withdrew funding and support.翻译:三名熟悉大理活动组织者的人士表示，11 月的论坛——就像去年计划的另一场去中心化互联网技术会议一样——在政府突然撤回资金和支持后被取消。

Many digital nomads who use co-working spaces are involved with technologies like blockchain, according to organisers, which they say has drawn scrutiny from local authorities.翻译:组织者称，许多使用联合办公空间的数字游牧者都参与了区块链等技术，他们说这些技术已经引起了地方当局的审查。

Two other co-working spaces were shut down unexpectedly for months, with one also visited by local police earlier this year, according to three people familiar with the matter.翻译:据三名知情人士透露，另外两个联合办公空间意外关闭了几个月，其中一个空间今年早些时候也被当地警方探访过。

China banned cryptocurrency mining and trading in 2021, part of a broader crackdown on the tech sector.翻译:中国于 2021 年禁止加密货币开采和交易，这是对科技行业更广泛打击的一部分。

"We are more low-key and don't emphasise digital nomads in our marketing anymore," one co-working space staffer told Reuters, adding that conservative local governments in rural towns like Dali are "cautious of emerging technologies".翻译:“我们更加低调，不再在营销中强调数字游牧民，”一位联合办公空间工作人员告诉路透社，并补充说大理等农村城镇的保守地方政府“对新兴技术持谨慎态度”。

Such state monitoring efforts do not surprise Ling, the academic. Since digital nomads, unlike university students, "are not subject to structured discipline, they are harder to manage", she said.翻译:这种国家监控的努力并不令学者令感到惊讶。她说，由于数字游牧民与大学生不同，“不受结构化纪律的约束，因此更难管理”。

Reporting by Laurie Chen; Editing by Katerina Ang翻译:陈劳瑞报道；卡特琳娜·昂 编辑
